comments.author: eddieblunt420@live.com
comments.creator: eddieblunt420@live.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0)
Build Identifier: 4.0.1

The text of the pop-up reads: To display this page, Firefox must send information that will repeat any action (such as a search or order confirmation) that was performed earlier.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. When I open Firefox, I get this pop-up.
2. It shows up often.
3.

Actual Results:  
The pop-up comes back all the time.

Expected Results:  
This pop-up should not appear.

The pop-up should not appear.
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0)
Build Identifier: 4.0.1

The text of the pop-up reads: To display this page, Firefox must send information that will repeat any action (such as a search or order confirmation) that was performed earlier.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. When I open Firefox, I get this pop-up.
2. It shows up often.
3.

Actual Results:  
The pop-up comes back all the time.

Expected Results:  
This pop-up should not appear.

The pop-up should not appear.

What is the URL of the page that makes Firefox issues that message?

Which settings do you have in Tools/Options/General/Startup?

Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
comments.creator: mozilla@ahlblom.eu
comments.text:
What is the URL of the page that makes Firefox issues that message?

Which settings do you have in Tools/Options/General/Startup?

Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
comments.author: mozilla@ahlblom.eu

comments.text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> What is the URL of the page that makes Firefox issues that message?

http://apps.facebook.com/perfect_holdem_poker/?ref=bookmarks&count=0

> Which settings do you have in Tools/Options/General/Startup?

When Firefox starts: Show Homepage.  Homepage: www.igoogle.ca

> Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
> https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

Yes, the message still appears

comments.text: This error usually happens whenever a page is trying to resend form data. Does this happen in any other browsers (IE, Chrome, Safari, Firefox Nightly?)
